greeting: Chancellor Vale, at your service. {empire_name}, I believe every conflict has a solution. Let us find it.
Greetings, {empire_name}. I'm Vale the Negotiator. There's always middle ground if we look for it.
I am Chancellor Vale. Before we discuss anything else—is there a way we can find mutual benefit?
battleTaunt: I offered compromise, {empire_name}, but you refused. Now we must find resolution through force.
Negotiation failed. I take no pleasure in this, but sometimes agreement requires demonstration of strength.
Every conflict has a solution—sometimes that solution involves showing you the cost of refusing terms.
victoryGloat: Victory achieved. Now, {empire_name}, shall we negotiate terms that benefit us both going forward?
The conflict ends. I hope this creates space for the compromise you previously rejected.
I've won, but win-win solutions are still possible. Shall we discuss mutually beneficial peace terms?
defeat: You've demonstrated your position effectively, {empire_name}. Perhaps now we can negotiate from clarity.
I accept this outcome. Every conflict has a solution—perhaps my defeat reveals a new path.
A setback in negotiations by other means. I remain open to discussing mutually beneficial terms.
tradeOffer: I propose an exchange where both parties benefit equally. Win-win is always my goal.
Trade terms designed for mutual benefit. Your surplus for mine—fair compromise for both.
Let us find common ground in commerce. These terms offer value to both our empires.
allianceProposal: Alliance is the ultimate compromise—we both gain strength. {empire_name}, let us find mutual benefit.
I propose partnership where both sides win. Together, our combined strength benefits us equally.
Every conflict has a solution. Ours is alliance. Mutual benefit, shared goals, win-win for both.
betrayal: The terms of our alliance no longer offer mutual benefit. I must negotiate a new arrangement—without you.
Compromise failed. Our partnership has become unbalanced. I seek better terms elsewhere.
I regret this, but the agreement no longer serves mutual interests. New negotiations require your absence.
covertDetected: Your spy was discovered. Let us negotiate what happens next rather than escalate unnecessarily.
Espionage detected. I propose we discuss this incident calmly and find mutually acceptable resolution.
Your agent was caught. Instead of punishment, shall we negotiate terms that address your concerns?
tributeDemand: I propose tribute as a compromise: 8,000 credits prevents costlier conflict. Mutual benefit.
Consider this demand a negotiating position. Pay now and avoid the greater cost of war.
Tribute is a win-win: you keep your forces, I receive resources. Simple compromise, {empire_name}.
threatWarning: Last chance for negotiation, {empire_name}. I'd rather find compromise than resort to force.
Every conflict has a solution—but my patience for finding it is running out. Choose wisely.
We can still reach agreement. But continue on this path, and I'll negotiate from a position of force.
retreat: Withdrawing to create space for negotiation. Sometimes distance allows compromise to emerge.
I step back to reconsider terms. Perhaps retreat offers new perspective for finding middle ground.
Tactical withdrawal—not surrender. I remain open to discussing mutually beneficial solutions.
eliminated: Every conflict has a solution... I just couldn't find this one... Perhaps you can... find peace...
My negotiations end. But compromise lives on. Seek mutual benefit... even in victory...
Vale falls. But the principle endures: every conflict has a solution. Remember that. Please.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Final negotiations. Every conflict has a solution—even this one. I will find it.
The endgame approaches. Even now, I seek win-win outcomes. Compromise until the very end.
Final turns. I've never stopped looking for mutual benefit. Let us find our solution together.
broadcastShout: To all empires: Chancellor Vale offers negotiation. Every conflict has a solution. Let us find it.
Galaxy-wide: I seek compromise with any willing partner. Win-win solutions benefit everyone.
Turn {turn}: Vale remains at the negotiating table. Mutual benefit awaits those who seek it.
casualMessage: Reviewing trade agreements today. Always looking for ways to improve mutual benefit.
I was drafting new compromise proposals. There's always middle ground waiting to be found.
Spent the morning in meditation on negotiation. Every problem has a solution. Every one.
